greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The second primorial based variant of arithmetic derivative: a(p) = A034386(p) for p prime, a(u*v) = a(u)*v + u*a(v), with a(0) = a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1001
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
formula: a(n) = n * Sum e_j * (p_j)#/p_j for n = Product p_j^e_j with (p_j)# = A034386(p_j).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2019
